branchCategory.name: MHZA2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Compact
branchCategory.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounting versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.
